Directions: Cook the pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile, place vegetables in a microwave-safe dish. Cover and microwave at 50% power for 7-8 minutes or until thawed; drain. Drain pasta and rinse in cold water. In a bowl, combine the pasta, vegetables and olives.
Combine salad dressing and garlic salt if desired; pour over salad and toss to coat. Refrigerate until serving.
Ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package frozen California blend vegetables (broccoli, cauliflower and carrots)
1 (2.25 ounce) can sliced ripe olives, drained
